Andrzej Jan Taramina wrote:
> 
> 
> Mike asks:
> 
>  > Does anyone else find the use of the acronym "APP" confusing as 
> opposed to
>  > just "Atom?" Is there a reason they are different?

I think "APP" could be confusing, but it's handier than typing in "Atom 
Protocol".

cheers
Bill
